target: 14.1 By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution
indicator_name: 14.1.1 Index of coastal eutrophication and floating plastic debris density
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 4.0 MB)
comments_limitations: This, or part of this, indicator is awaiting the development of internationally established methodology and standards (classified by the UN as tier 3). Data follows the UN specification for this indicator. This indicator has not been identified in collaboration with topic experts.
